comment: Smart Data Models - ExcIEEEAC5A adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcIEEEAC5A/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE Std 421.5-2005 type AC5A model. The model represents a simplified model for brushless excitation systems. The regulator is supplied from a source, such as a permanent magnet generator, which is not affected by system disturbances.  Unlike other ac models, this model uses loaded rather than open circuit exciter saturation data in the same way as it is used for the dc models.  Because the model has been widely implemented by the industry, it is sometimes

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: efd1
contents.comment: Exciter voltage at which exciter saturation is defined (E).  Typical Value = 5.6. Default: 0.0

contents.name: efd2
contents.comment: Exciter voltage at which exciter saturation is defined (E).  Typical Value = 4.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ka
contents.comment: Voltage regulator gain (K).  Typical Value = 400. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ke
contents.comment: Exciter constant related to self-excited field (K).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kf
contents.comment: Excitation control system stabilizer gains (K).  Typical Value = 0.03. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: seefd1
contents.comment: Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, E (S[E]).  Typical Value = 0.86. Default: 0.0

contents.name: seefd2
contents.comment: Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, E (S[E]).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: ta
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0

contents.name: te
contents.comment: Exciter time constant, integration rate associated with exciter control (T).  Typical Value = 0.8. Default: 0

contents.name: tf1
contents.comment: Excitation control system stabilizer time constant (T).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: tf2
contents.comment: Excitation control system stabilizer time constant (T).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: tf3
contents.comment: Excitation control system stabilizer time constant (T).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: vrmax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = 7.3. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = -7.3. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
